idea-plugin.name: GifSprite
idea-plugin.description:
GifSprite - A fun animated sprite for your IDE!

What it does:

  • Drag & Drop - Move the sprite anywhere you want
  • Resize - Make it bigger or smaller (0-512)
  • Two Modes - Auto Play (always moving) or Type Mode (moves when you type)
  • Speed Control - Make it faster or slower
  • Custom GIFs - Use your own GIF files
  • Any Language - Name your GIFs in Chinese, Japanese, etc.

How to use:

  1. After install, you'll see it in the bottom-right corner
  2. Drag it to move it around
  3. Go to Settings → Appearance → GifSprite to change options
  4. Use View → Toggle GifSprite to show/hide
